response.original_title: RFK in the Land of Apartheid: A Ripple of Hope
response.overview: Featuring never before seen archival footage and interviews, “RFK in the land of Apartheid” tells the little-known story of Senator Robert Kennedy‘s influential visit to South Africa during the worst years of an apartheid. The film follows Kennedy in South Africa during the five-day visit, including his famous “Day of Affirmation“ speech at the University of Cape Town on June 6, 1966.
response.title: RFK in the Land of Apartheid: A Ripple of Hope
